knownMembers.name: Laboon
knownMembers.status: Left behind at Twin Cape for safety

keyMoments.title: Rumbar Pirates' Backstory Revealed
keyMoments.description: The history of the Rumbar Pirates and their promise to Laboon is told through Crocus's flashback. They befriended Laboon 50 years ago but had to leave him behind when entering the Grand Line.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew that made the original promise to Laboon, setting up one of the most emotional storylines in the series.

keyMoments.title: Promise to Return to Laboon
keyMoments.description: Captain Yorki and the Rumbar Pirates promise to return to Laboon within two or three years after completing their Grand Line journey.
keyMoments.significance: This broken promise becomes the source of Laboon's 50 years of grief and self-harm, and later becomes Brook's primary motivation.

description: A pirate crew from the West Blue that befriended Laboon 50 years before the main story. They were known for their musical abilities and left Laboon at Twin Cape with Crocus, promising to return. They never did, and their fate remained unknown until much later in the series.
notableAchievements: Befriended and cared for Laboon the Island Whale
Entered the Grand Line 50 years before the Straw Hats

keyMoments.title: The Unluckies Enforce Mission Failure
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works agents Mr. 13 and Miss Friday attack Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday for failing to capture Laboon.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Baroque Works' ruthless enforcement policies and introduces the Unluckies as the organization's messengers and executioners.
